attributes.action: Stop the change of historic public house names
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm sick and tired of seeing historic public houses having the name changed for  
a quick financial return.
A local 18th century inn in Coventry was changed from the Rising Sun to "FLARES and painted pink need I say more.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
